3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Lovely family home within walking distance of 24th St corridor. Views across Noe Valley to Downtown. Lovingly maintained by same family for a generation. Vertical and horizontal addition about 20 years ago, seismic upgrades, kitchen, bathrooms and all other finishes were all new at that time. For comp purposes only.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Top floor 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, 1-car deeded parking condominium plus a deeded 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom garden unit in one of the best blocks in Noe Valley. Updated to modern standards while maintaining period details, the flexible floor plan is flooded with natural light. In 2019-2020 the current owners made significant upgrades to the property including a complete renovation of the top floor kitchen, living room, master bedroom, guest bathroom, new wood floor throughout and new quality appliances. THE COST OF THE RENOVATION WAS $575K.Views of the city and the bay can be enjoyed from the East facing deck. Most unique to this property is the deeded garden unit with French doors that open directly to the deeded garden. The home is 1/2 block to the Douglass park and a short walk to 24th Street shops, restaurants and transportation.
Confidential Remarks: OFFER DATE THURSDAY 3/16 by 3pm. List of remodeled items are in the disclosures. For information about the garden unit see the 3R report and the CC&R. Property website www.835Douglass.com video https://vimeo.com/804293742

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Kathleen Close - Agt: 510-913-8128 - Perched on the east side of Diamond St in prime Noe Valley neighborhood, this single family home offers awesome iconic Twin Peaks views. Enjoy some of the best SF weather and proximity to eclectic 24th St conveniences and The Castro.Classic 1912 Edwardian style is reflected in period details throughout. Light filled, spacious foyer, refinished wood floors, fireplace and a formal dining room with built-in cabinets make this a charming home. The west facing enclosed sun porch where you can enjoy dramatic sunsets will be a go-to spot. Plus, an enchanting, deep backyard with a mix of mature trees, sunshine & open sky. Enjoy entertaining & private al fresco dining in the parklike setting via easy kitchen & dining room access to the back deck. Property features ample private parking in the 2 car garage with electric & water service or use as a workshop or additional storage beyond the basement & attic.Explore the potential here with RH-2 Zoning!Conveniently close to 24th St shops, restaurants for every taste, Whole Foods, weekly Noe Valley Farmers Market, schools, parks and nearby Muni, BART and tech shuttle stops. The 22nd St Jungle Stairs, two doors away, provide a good workout and access to The Castro.
Confidential Remarks: Probate Sale, Seller/Administrator. See offer acceptance timeline information in disclosure packet, allow extra time for reply. As-is sale, please contact listing agent for disclosure link.  Escrow opened with Lawyers Title, Escrow Officer Bea Ayotte, (650) 445-6310. CRS Tax Report square footage differs from larger digital measurement in floor plan.  Neither seller nor agent warrant square footage information. Buyer to verify square footage.
Directions to Property: From Market St, S on Diamond

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Imagine coming home to a tranquil retreat, perfectly nestled above the Castro, overlooking our stunning skyline. This home offers it all! An open layout, multiple view decks, a picturesque garden, and bountiful living space for everyone! The grand living room features vaulted ceilings, a dramatic fireplace, and a large picture window showcasing unobstructed views of the San Francisco downtown skyline and bay. The updated kitchen features updated cabinetry and a stainless steel appliance suite. The expansive owner's suite will be a place for you to be inspired and recharge. Truly a spa-like experience, the owner's suite boasts a large walk-in shower, marble-appointed oversized vanity, and bountiful light. A lower-level junior one-bedroom suite makes this a perfect offering for a multi-generational family or the savvy homeowner looking for a home with income potential. This home is perfectly situated, with the Castro and Noe Valley just a stone throw's away...
Confidential Remarks: Offers as they come. Disclosure Package Available upon request. Please email BOTH jonathan@vanguardsf.com & alanm@vanguardsf.com for disclosures or private showings. Only use SFAR Purchase Contract. On the purchase contract, stipulate that buyer's deposit will be in escrow within one (1) business day of acceptance. Escrow has been opened at First American Title with Mijael Schmidt. See more at www.CastroViewHome.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enchanted multi-tiered landscaped garden with granite steps that curve up the hillside of your own private park. This classic three bedroom, one full bath and one half bath property is situated on a highly coveted block of Diamond Street known for its panoramic Cityscape, Twin Peaks and Sutro Tower views. This property is thoughtfully curated to reflect both the past and present, resulting in a dwelling that is as much a work of art as it is a comfortable sanctuary. Located in the coveted Eureka Valley neighborhood, easy access to transportation and shopping and dining in both the Castro and 24th St neighborhoods. Street parking is not a problem on this block - and options to add a garage are available.

The sellers confirm they have regularly parked their car directly in front of their home on the street over the last 20 years, except for approximately five isolated occasions.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Amazing opportunity to own a spacious full-floor Noe Valley condominium that checks all the boxes here: 2 Bedrooms plus space for setting up a home office, 2 Bathrooms, an exclusive south-facing garden/patio, 2 car parking, and additional storage room. The unit offers a desirable open floor plan that is perfect for entertaining. The updated kitchen with SS appliances and expanded cabinetry opens to a dining area and a beautiful expansive living room with a handsome heath ceramic tiled wood burning fireplace surround/ mantle. This light-filled space, with soaring tall ceilings and oversized bay windows, accentuates the oak floors and modern fixtures. 2 generous size BRs: includes spacious primary suite features double closets and a spa-like bath with a jacuzzi tub and shower. Enjoy the unit's exclusive sunny, south-facing garden patio with beautiful landscaping and mature trees. An in-unit washer and dryer, an additional deeded storage room, and two deeded parking spaces round out this beautiful condominium. Excellent walkable & commuter location, close to the 24th St corridor for shops, cafes, restaurants, transit, and two amazing kids' playgrounds and dog parks. Low HOA due $183/month. A must-see!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Straddling the highly-coveted Noe Valley and Castro neighborhoods, this expansive 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom penthouse home spans 2 floors and enjoys epic views, an ideal layout, and two impressive outdoor terraces. Featuring an open floorplan living and dining room, this residence boasts spectacular views of San Francisco, the Bay, Oakland, and even Mt. Diablo through large, brand-new windows. The spacious chef's kitchen opens to the dining room and features abundant cabinetry and counter space, as well as a full suite of high-end stainless steel appliances. Two bright bedrooms, a full bathroom with a stacked washer and dryer, and a charming powder room complete this level. Find sanctuary in the massive upper-level primary suite that opens to an immense terrace with sweeping views and includes large closets and a spa-like bathroom. A second private terrace offers additional space for outdoor enjoyment. Beautiful finishes throughout incl. crown molding, wood floors, and a wood-burning fireplace. The garage offers 1-car parking with EV Charger, additional storage space, and a convenient elevator directly to the main level. Easily walk to cafes, restaurants, parks, and many transit options, including Neighbor's Corner, Douglass Playground, Whole Foods, Kite Hill, Philz Coffee, & more!
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Dana Cohen at 415-305-3539 for all showing requests. Please email priya@teamrivet.com for disclosures, questions, and offer information. Buyers to investigate all information provided to their own satisfaction. Three prior MLS listing show square footage at 1,668 sq.ft. Graphic Artist Floorplan measures 1,600 sq.ft., Tax Records show 1,586 sq.ft., Buyer to Investigate to Their Satisfaction. All buyers to use the most current 8-page SFAR contract. Escrow open with Heather Shiffer @ First American Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into an extraordinary Noe Valley home-an unmatched loft that's a lifestyle statement. The open floor plan with soaring ceilings offers a harmonious space over living and dining areas, flooded with natural light through oversized windows. Distinguished aesthetics, like built-in cabinetry and Roman Tuscan columns, elevate the loft into a visual masterpiece. A spacious bonus room serves as an office or 2nd bedroom, meeting dynamic needs. The kitchen's 5-burner gas range, stainless steel appliances, and ample storage, is complemented by a contemporary bathroom on the first level. Ascend to the lofted 2nd level, featuring an open-air bedroom, illuminated seating section, and a wrap-around catwalk leading to the wardrobe area with a versatile space for a vanity or office nook. Step outside to the common roof deckan ideal spot to kick back and savor Noe's beautiful skies or host BBQs. Streamline life with common laundry and an abundance of storage in common area and attic. With incredible walkability in the vibrant Noe community, the location is primejust 2 blocks from the shops on 24th st, parks and playgrounds in every direction, and a dog park just up the hill. Every amenity is at your fingertips, making this not just a home but an exciting new phase of life.
Confidential Remarks: This home is being marketed as a 2 bedroom. Tax records show it as a 1 bedroom. The den/bonus room was used by the sellers as a bedroom, contains 2 egresses, and measures 9' x 12'6 (graphic artist).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Bright Noe Valley home on a prime sought-after street, one+ blocks to 24th Street corridor, and close to parks & playgrounds. The grand Victorian facade welcomes you to a well-preserved and thoughtful interior with period details, high ceilings, and spacious rooms. The front living room hosts classic bay windows with a stained glass trim, a wood-burning fireplace, and is decorated by intricate trim and light medallions seen throughout the home. The dining area leads to an updated kitchen with abundant storage and countertop space opening to a breakfast area. French doors off the breakfast area open to a walkout deck and level yard with mature trees and direct Southern sun. Back inside, a bedroom, full bath and laundry room complete the main level. Upstairs, an ample-sized primary suite boasts lovely views, built-in storage, and a balcony. Across the hall is a bright bedroom with an en-suite bath, and a walkout deck. Additionally, the home is equipped with a one-car garage and copious amounts of storage or future development. MUST SEE!
Confidential Remarks: Offers will be reviewed on 2/15 at 10:00AM.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a flat tree-lined block right off 24th Street, 404 Hoffman is a tastefully remodeled 2 bed, 2 bath Noe Valley Condo ready for its new occupants. Featuring wide plank oak flooring and a deck spanning the entire front of the building, the open living/dining/kitchen is ideally laid out for modern day living. A wood-burning fireplace accents the living room and the Chef's kitchen features a central island, Bertazzoni appliances, sleek Quartz & marble countertops and an abundance of cabinet space. The two bedrooms are located at the each end of the unit for ultimate comfort & privacy. The spacious primary bedroom offers a wall of built-in closets and an en-suite bathroom with dual vanities, jacuzzi tub, walk-in shower and make-up counter. The 2nd bedroom faces the front of the building and has direct access to the deck. There is a full 2nd bathroom off the hallway for added convenience. Accessible rooftop with dramatic views of the city and the bay. 2-car parking, recessed lighting, Nest Thermostat & extra storage complete the offering. One block from Douglass playground, Phill's Coffee, all the shops and restaurants on 24th and within easy access to public transportation & 101/280 freeway access.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Situated at the top of 22nd St, this classic 1908 Victorian condo has wonderful views of Bernal Heights, San Francisco Bay, and the picturesque architecture of Noe Valley. This quiet pocket of Noe Valley is a hidden gem - it's close enough to get to 24th St quickly and easily but far enough away that there is ample street parking. This home has a wonderful mix of Victorian detail and modern finishes. The kitchen and bathroom have been recently updated to fit modern tastes, while the classic charm and timeless architectural details are still in place. A private deck off of the dining room leads to a drought-friendly, low-maintenance shared backyard. This is a true San Francisco classic that must be seen to be fully appreciated.
Confidential Remarks: Buyer could not perform. Property will be relisted in 2023. Call Joe Jr with questions.
Directions to Property: On north side of 22nd St between Worth and Hoffman

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perched atop Noe Valley, one of SF's most prestigious neighborhoods, this special home blends the best of graceful Victorian detailing w/contemporary updates for today's lifestyle. Flooded with light, this home has been thoughtfully reimagined & merges a modern sensibility with custom artisan craftsmanship & walk-out yard. Main living level features a gracious living room with bespoke finishes, FP and custom built-in shelving with views to Sutro Tower. Elegant dining room opens to the kitchen and is perfect for entertaining. Connecting seamlessly to the backyard is a chef's kitchen w/generous island, stone countertops, custom walnut cabinetry & high end appliances. The private walk-out yard features multiple terraces & decks w/mature landscaping. Private half bath completes this level. Luxurious primary suite occupies an entire level and features a dressing area, multiple custom closets, built-ins, deluxe WFH office & a generous spa-like bath w/steam shower & soaking tub. 2 bedrooms upstairs feature views, HUGE walk-in closets & an updated shared bathroom. A large 2 car garage w/a generous deck above it completes the home. Set in a coveted neighborhood and just steps to the best dining, shopping and parks on 24th Street, this special home is the one you have been waiting for.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A quintessential Victorian facade gives way to an airy, sophisticated modernism, open-plan living, fully articulated garden & just the right balance of openness & privacy on an A+ block in the heart of Noe Valley. With custom design, intelligent interior architecture, glorious natural light & fine craftsmanship, this highly refined home goes from elegant entertaining & Zoom-to-bloom functionality with finesse & grace. The level garden offers true outdoor rooms: a drought tolerant wonderland, lush with native/edible plantings: olive, lemon, guava,lime,Buddha's hand. Anchored in quality materials & classic detailing, the key assets of this polished residence include: soaring ceilings, expansive open public rooms + gas fireplace, freshly finished bamboo flooring, custom eat-in kitchen & garden access via an impressive steel & glass footbridge. The serene primary suite has a private patio with fire pit, heated seating, fountain + botanical wonders. 3 LUXE baths, custom library, radiant heat, NEST systems, EV charger are just some of the thoughtful elements. Sought after walkability to 24th Street Village, Noe Valley Public Library, Douglass Playground, tennis courts & Phil's Coffee! Ea

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Discover the epitome of refined living where this exquisite 3 bd & 2.5 bath Victorian awaits. Crafted of the finest materials including milled trimwork, 8'ft doors, custom cabinetry, NanaWall glass doors, and built-in sound system. The open-concept kitchen-living area features top-of-the-line appliances and a single-slab Italian Calacutta honed marble dining island, matching counters and custom cabinetry. An in-ceiling 9ft screen transforms the room into an entertainment haven. NanaWall doors reveal an outdoor oasis with a dual-sided fireplace that creates the ultimate al fresco experience. The ensuite bedroom with spa-like marble bath with heated floors, family room with Negro Marquina honed marble fireplace, and powder room complete the main floor. Upstairs is adorned with 2 bedrooms, Bay views, a patio and an opulent Roman clay-wall bath and soaking tub. Parking and proximity to 24th St along with the best of Noe Valley make this exquisite home the embodiment of sophistication.
Confidential Remarks: Transparent pricing. Pre-Escrow opened with First American Title. Disclosures linked to MLS or download here: https://app.disclosures.io/link/664-Douglass-Street-n7oia17w. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This quaint home is light and bright it has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, with hardwood floors, and a nice garden backyard it also has an attached parking garage. It is nestled in the iconic Twin Peaks neighborhood on a quiet street. Great views of the City. Twin Peaks, is known for its breathtaking views of the City, and the luscious greenery of the surrounding hills. This quaint community provides a serene escape from the city's hustle and bustle, yet is conveniently close to everything you want and need. Your buyers couldn't ask for a better neighborhood. At this price point, this home will not last long.

Public Remarks: This quaint home is light and bright it has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, with hardwood floors, and a nice garden backyard it also has an attached parking garage. It is nestled in the iconic Twin Peaks neighborhood on a quiet street. Great views of the City. Twin Peaks, is known for its breathtaking views of the City, and the luscious greenery of the surrounding hills. This quaint community provides a serene escape from the city's hustle and bustle, yet is conveniently close to everything you want and need. Your buyers couldn't ask for a better neighborhood. At this price point, this home will not last long.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 900K price reduction! Exceptional 3-bed, 3.5-bath home built tastefully updated in 2018. Solar panels were added and paid in full. Versatile layout offers single-family living or separate unit potential: you choose. Main level features an open kitchen/dining area with Venetian plaster walls and high-end stainless steel appliances including a Wolf range & Sub-zero refrigerator. Upstairs, primary suite with spa-like bath and sunset views from decks. Separate laundry rooms on top and lower level. Right outside your door, Dixie Alley offers a lifeline to Noe Valley and Castro, with local favorites like Le Marais Bakery, Bernie's Coffee, Firefly, and Starbelly. With a walk score of 78, a seemingly endless amount of secret stairways, including the 22nd Street jungle steps, lets you explore nearby neighborhoods with ease. You'll also appreciate access to Whole Foods for weekly grocery shopping, and nearby playgrounds like Noe Courts, Douglass Park, and Alvarado Park. For more exploration, the Castro BART allows for easy access to the rest of the city.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located discreetly on a coveted block with breathtaking views, this Noe Valley residence provides a harmonious blend of indoor-outdoor living. With its sun-kissed walls of glass, the greenhouse, enchanting front garden and playful water fountain welcome you home. Step inside where high ceilings, big windows and skylights combine to bring natural light into the spacious open layout. The dining room leads onto an expansive deck and magical backyard where you can host memorable gatherings or simply unwind after a long day. Revel in the pleasure of the contemporary kitchen with luxurious details including built-in ovens, a five burner gas cooktop, side by side refrigerator, dishwasher, granite countertops, and elegant wood cabinets. Two large bedrooms complete this level. The primary bedroom has a fireplace and sitting area, custom built-ins, ample closet space and ensuite bathroom. The second spacious bedroom has direct access to another bathroom. On the lower level discover functional bonus rooms, laundry and bike storage. Whether in search of a home office, a dedicated gym, a playroom or room for guests, this space provides great possibilities. SimpliSafe & Ring systems. Easy access
Confidential Remarks: Contact Susan for more information. www.3978-22nd.com
Directions to Property: Castro to 22nd Street. Entrance on the 22nd St. Ju

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This reimagined Edwardian home blends stunning design, period references, open floor plan, integrated indoor/outdoor living/entertaining, and smart home technology. Located in the heart of Eureka Valley, near the Castro commercial district, it captures the best of today's facon de vivre'' while reflecting a warmth and intimacy not seen in most open floor plans. This 2,885 sf home boasts 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, 4 outdoor spaces, and 2 private 1-car garages. The main floor offers high ceilings, a spacious living room with a w/b fireplace, a versatile den/media/bedroom, and a chef's kitchen with high-end appliances leading to a dining area with handsome built-in and beverage cooler. A sliding wall of windows connects the living area to a stylized backyard for al fresco gatherings. Upstairs, two large bedrooms have en-suite full baths, and a rear deck overlooking the entertainment area, while the front primary suite features A/C, a pass-through closet, and a spa-bath, and offers northern and downtown views. On the ground level, a separate entrance studio serves as a game room or guest/ADU/au pair/In-Law suite. This home boasts modern built-ins, ample closet and storage space, custom doors, hardwood floors, and premium finishes throughout.
Confidential Remarks: By private appointment only. Please call listing agent to arrange for your convenient and private showing. Disclosures are available. There is an itemized list of furnishings available for purchase by seperate agreement. Art and antiques are EXCLUDED from the sale. Buyers are encouraged to investigate all matters to their satisfaction. Listing agent has not and will not verify any information provided by 3rd parties, which is deemed reliable.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled in San Francisco's Noe Valley, this 1908 Victorian blends classic elegance with modern upgrades. An open floor plan connects living areas, while Bay windows flood the space with sunlight, accentuating rich floors and intricate details. At the front, a proper entrance leads to the formal living room. Adjacent, the dining room and lounge area adjoin the spacious kitchen, boasting new countertops and top-of-the-line appliances. Walk-out access leads to the deck and lush backyard, offering ample space for outdoor entertaining or gardening, including a secret garden-style deck. Upstairs, the primary suite offers tranquility with a grand arched window and cathedral ceilings, along with two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. The lower level features a media room or guest suite with backyard access, offering privacy and convenience. Remodeled with a cozy sitting area, mudroom, abundant storage, laundry room, and garage. In a sought-after neighborhood near shops, restaurants, and amenities. With its open floor plan and expansive backyard, this remodeled Noe Valley home offers a perfect blend of historic charm and contemporary living. Just steps away from the shops and eateries of 24th Street, residents can enjoy the convenience of nearby amenities.
Confidential Remarks: For Showings, please text or call Taylor: 209-988-9822. City has approved a 1,343 sq ft expansion project. See disclosure package for plans. Escrow opened with Liz Paglinawan, First American, lpaglinawan@firstam.com.
